name: BMI Widget
author: Swain Strickland

sections.description: BMI Widget adds a widget that displays a BMI calculator with the option for standard or metric measurements. The user also has options for styling the widget.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the bmi-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPpress.
  3. Add the widget to your theme in the Appeaance > Widget menu in WordPress.
sections.faq: If you have any problems or would like to see a new feature you can find the project at https://github.com/swaincreates/bmi-widget

short_description: Adds a widget that displays a BMI calculator with standard or metric measurements and options for styling.
description: BMI Widget adds a widget that displays a BMI calculator with the option for standard or metric measurements. The user also has options for styling the widget.
